subject: Tennis
Cancer
lead_paragraph: The retired tennis champion Martina Navratilova, who remains a remarkably active 53-year-old, said on Wednesday that she was found to have noninvasive breast cancer in February.
snippet: The retired tennis champion Martina Navratilova, who remains a remarkably active 53-year-old, said on Wednesday that she was found to have noninvasive breast cancer in February.
